name: WILLIAM_WALKS
description: Vertical SaaS for the pet care industry. Production-ready business suite with real-time GPS tracking and automated client reporting.

details.overview: A complete business management platform built for a professional dog walking service. Features real-time GPS tracking during walks, automated report cards sent to clients after each session, and a comprehensive admin dashboard for scheduling and client management.
features: Real-time GPS tracking with live map updates during walks
Automated post-walk report cards with photos and notes
Client booking system with availability calendar
Admin dashboard for managing schedules and clients
Stripe payment integration for seamless billing

name: MAKEUP//DUPE
description: High-concurrency data pipeline and similarity engine that reverse-engineers cosmetic formulations to find affordable alternatives.

details.overview: A mobile app that helps users find affordable alternatives (dupes) to expensive makeup products. The backend scrapes and normalizes product data from major retailers, then uses a similarity engine to match products with 90%+ ingredient overlap.
features: Barcode scanning for instant product lookup
Ingredient similarity matching with 90%+ accuracy
Price comparison across major retailers
User reviews and community-sourced dupes
Favorites and shopping list functionality

name: PROD_TRADER
description: High-frequency quantitative trading system executing strategies with 5ms latency. Real-time 'Insider Sniper' algorithm monitoring market anomalies.

details.overview: PulseEdge is a quantitative trading engine designed for speed and precision. It implements multiple trading strategies including the 'Insider Sniper' which detects unusual market activity patterns that may indicate informed trading, and executes positions with sub-10ms latency.
features: Sub-10ms trade execution latency
Multiple strategy lanes: Insider Sniper, Earnings Momentum, 3-Day Dip
Real-time market data processing and analysis
Risk management with automatic position sizing
Performance dashboard with P&L tracking

name: MANGA_OCR
description: Real-time computer vision pipeline for translating raw manga pages using OCR and LLM-powered context-aware translation.

details.overview: An automated translation pipeline that takes raw manga pages and produces translated versions while preserving the original artwork. Uses OCR to detect and extract text from speech bubbles, LLMs for context-aware translation, and image in-painting to seamlessly replace text.
features: Automatic text bubble detection using computer vision
OCR text extraction optimized for Japanese characters
Context-aware translation using GPT-4
Image in-painting to replace text naturally
Batch processing for entire chapters

name: MOBILE_ASSISTANT
description: Cross-platform productivity assistant with AI-driven scheduling and focus tools.

name: AI_DISPATCHER
description: Automated dispatching system for towing fleets optimizing route efficiency using AI-driven logistics.

name: DB_SYSTEMS
description: In-memory B+-tree implementation in C++. Engineered relational schemas and concurrency control.

name: UNIX_SHELL
description: Custom Linux shell in C implementing process creation, piping, I/O redirection, and job control.

name: 2048_SOLVER
description: Adversarial AI using Minimax with alpha-beta pruning achieving >90% win rates.

name: PARENT_APP
description: Agile/Scrum Android app with breathing guidance modules and UML state modeling.

name: ALGO_BENCHMARK
description: Comparative benchmarking of Quicksort, Introsort, and Prim's algorithm on massive datasets.
